desktop.title: Documentation
desktop.intro: Fusce vitae enim tempus, vulputate arcu sed, posuere est. In accumsan quam ac malesuada fermentum. Vivamus posuere mi sit amet posuere convallis.

sections.content:
Start off by installing module from npm:
yarn add design-engine-playgroundNow setup your account & integrate postbuild script:
npx pair-url --initLastly generate new playground(s) from last build:
npx pair-url --parse

Add npm module to project:
yarn add design-engine-playgroundSetup postbuild script & account:
npx pair-url --init

Drop the postbuild script & delete your account:
npx pair-url --remove

Displays available commands:
npx pair-url --helpSets up project & account:
npx pair-url --initGenerates new playground(s) from last build:
npx pair-url --parseRemove the postbuild script from project & delete Pair user account:
npx pair-url --remove
